name: Weapons
description: **Aimed:** A weapon with the *Aimed* trait can be aimed as a bonus action, increasing the weapon's range to the one listed.
**Reloading:** A weapon with the *Reloading* trait requires a bonus action to be reloaded after a certain number of shots before it can be fired again.
**Penetrating:** An enemy who is attacked with a weapon that has the *Penetrating* trait has a -2 to their AC against the attack.

equipment.name: Crystal Sniper
equipment.body: One of the oldest sniper rifles in Dekatreis, it has kept up prominance as a decent long-ranged option due to its ease of use and low-cost ammunition.
